name: native-libremon-napi
description: LibreHardwareMonitor N-API addon for Node.js and Electron - hardware monitoring with self-contained .NET runtime

scripts.install: echo Skipping automatic build - run 'npm run build' explicitly
scripts.build: npm run build:managed && npm run build:native && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:managed: dotnet publish ../managed/LibreHardwareMonitorBridge/LibreHardwareMonitorBridge.csproj -c Release -r win-x64 --self-contained true -o ../managed/LibreHardwareMonitorBridge/bin/Release/net9.0/win-x64/publish-selfcontained && node ./scripts/fix-runtimeconfig.js
scripts.build:native: node-gyp configure && node patch-vcxproj.js && node-gyp build
